description: Impose changing emissions of RCP8.5 long-lived greenhouse gases, including CO2, N2O and halogenated gases.
name: RCP85WellMixedGHGEm
rationale: Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas Emissions
